subject.topic: Debate over slavery, the Secession Crisis, and the Civil War: Tennessee as a uniquely divided border state .

mods.note: "Presented to Miss Nora by Q.V." is inscribed in pencil on the cover of this piece, which has an alternate title of "When This Cruel War is Over." One of the most popular songs during the American Civil War, this song was sung by everyone, including the soldiers in the field. Included in a bound volume of sheet music once owned by Miss Nora Gardner, a Tennessean.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
